contract aims at deploying lockers that will invest in Convex pools.          Plain pools should contain only stablecoins denominated in same currency (all tokens in USD or all tokens in EUR for example, otherwise USD_Convertible won't be correct).","kind":"dev","methods":{"constructor":{"params":{"_BASE_TOKEN_MP":"if metapool should specify the address of the base token of the pool. If plain pool, set to the zero address.","_CVX_Deposit_Address":"address of the convex Booster contract.","_MP_UNDERLYING_LP_POOL":"if metapool specify address of the underlying LP token's pool (3CRV for example).","_ZivoeAddresses":"_ZivoeAddresses[0] = The administrator of this contract (intended to be ZivoeDAO) and _ZivoeAddresses[1] = GBL (the ZivoeGlobals contract).","_boolMetaOrPlainAndRewards":"_boolMetaOrPlainAndRewards[0] => If true: metapool, if false: plain pool. _boolMetaOrPlainAndRewards[1] => if true: extra rewards distributed on top of CRV or CVX.","_chainlinkPriceFeeds":"array containing the addresses of the chainlink price feeds, should be provided in correct order (refer to coins index in Curve pool)","_convexPoolID":"Indicate the ID of the Convex pool where the LP token should be staked.","_curvePool":"address of the Curve Pool.","_numberOfTokensPP":"If pool is a metapool, set to 0. If plain pool, specify the number of coins in the pool.","_numberOfTokensUnderlyingLPPool":"if metapool: specify the number of tokens in the underlying LP pool (for 3CRV pool set to 3). If plain pool: set to 0.","_rewardsAddresses":"addresses of the extra rewards. params._BASE_TOKEN_MP: if metapool should specify the address of the base token of the pool. If plain pool, set to the zero address.
params._CVX_Deposit_Address: address of the convex Booster contract.
params._MP_UNDERLYING_LP_POOL: if metapool specify address of the underlying LP token's pool (3CRV for example).
params._ZivoeAddresses: _ZivoeAddresses[0] = The administrator of this contract (intended to be ZivoeDAO) and _ZivoeAddresses[1] = GBL (the ZivoeGlobals contract).
params._boolMetaOrPlainAndRewards: _boolMetaOrPlainAndRewards[0] => If true: metapool, if false: plain pool. _boolMetaOrPlainAndRewards[1] => if true: extra rewards distributed on top of CRV or CVX.
params._chainlinkPriceFeeds: array containing the addresses of the chainlink price feeds, should be provided in correct order (refer to coins index in Curve pool)
params._convexPoolID: Indicate the ID of the Convex pool where the LP token should be staked.
params._numberOfTokensPP: If pool is a metapool, set to 0. If plain pool, specify the number of coins in the pool.
params._numberOfTokensUnderlyingLPPool: if metapool: specify the number of tokens in the underlying LP pool (for 3CRV pool set to 3). If plain pool: set to 0.
params._rewardsAddresses: addresses of the extra rewards. If _extraRewards = false set as an array of the zero address.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.ids: The IDs of the assets within the ERC1155 to migrate.

params.tokenId: The ID of the NFT to migrate.

params.tokenIds: The IDs of the NFTs to migrate.

params.amounts: The amounts of "assets" to migrate, corresponds to "assets" by position in array.

params.ids: The IDs of the assets within the ERC1155 to migrate.

params.tokenId: The ID of the NFT to migrate.

params.amounts: The amounts of "assets" to migrate, corresponds to "assets" by position in array.

params.tokenIds: The IDs of the NFTs to migrate.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferOwnershipAndLock(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

pullFromLocker(address).notice: Migrates entire ERC20 balance from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerERC1155(address,uint256[],.notice: Migrates ERC1155 assets from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerERC721(address,uint256,byt.notice: Migrates an ERC721 from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerMulti(address[]).notice: Migrates full amount of ERC20s from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerMultiERC721(address[],uint.notice: Migrates ERC721s from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerMultiPartial(address[],uin.notice: Migrates specific amounts of ERC20s from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerPartial(address,uint256).notice: Migrates specific amount of ERC20 from locker to owner().

pushToLocker(address,uint256).notice: Migrates specific amount of ERC20 from owner() to locker.

pushToLockerERC1155(address,uint256[],ui.notice: Migrates ERC1155 assets from owner() to locker.

pushToLockerERC721(address,uint256,bytes.notice: Migrates an ERC721 from owner() to locker.

pushToLockerMulti(address[],uint256[]).notice: Migrates specific amounts of ERC20s from owner() to locker.

pushToLockerMultiERC721(address[],uint25.notice: Migrates ERC721s from owner() to locker.

documentation.text: @dev defines a period for keepers to invest before public accessible function.
@dev If true = metapool, if false = plain pool.
@dev If true, extra rewards are distributed on top of CRV and CVX. If false, no extra rewards.
@dev USD convertible, used for forwardYield() accounting.
@dev Part of LP token increase over baseline that is owed to the YDL (needed for accounting when pulling or investing capital).
@dev CRV tokens harvested that need to be transfered by ZVL to the YDL.
@dev CVX tokens harvested that need to be transfered by ZVL to the YDL.
@dev Extra rewards harvested that need to be transfered by ZVL to the YDL.

@dev Reward addresses.
TODO: could optimize with including CVX and CRV in "rewardsAddresses", to check.

documentation.text:
@dev    This contract aims at deploying lockers that will invest in Convex pools. 
         Plain pools should contain only stablecoins denominated in same currency (all tokens in USD or all tokens in EUR for example, otherwise USD_Convertible won't be correct).
